title: Effective Language Learning Design Through Working Memory Optimization

context.additional_context: Short-term intensive language improvement program for in-service practitioners. Applies a blended approach combining theoretical learning and practical activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the limitations of working memory and cognitive load theory and apply them to language learning design.
Learners can identify three or more cognitive load factors caused by excessive use of visual elements.
Based on formative assessment results, learners can remove unnecessary visual elements from their learning materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
